silverbullet.title: Silver Bullet
silverbullet.description: I've been working on Silver Bullet since 2021. Which later became my Bachelor's thesis. During my contribution at the project I've learned and improved in a lot of fundamentals for better maintainability, reusability. I had the opportunity to learn about SOLID principles, DRY, code abstraction through DDD and OOP and TDD to ensure everything worked as expected.
